StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: NHLBI GO-ESP: Early-Onset Myocardial Infarction Exome Chip (Broad EOMI)

Policy.acknowledgement_statement:
“This study is part of the NHLBI Grand Opportunity Exome Sequencing Project (GO-ESP). Funding for GO-ESP was provided by NHLBI grants RC2 HL103010 (HeartGO), RC2 HL102923 (LungGO) and RC2 HL102924 (WHISP). The exome sequencing was performed through NHLBI grants RC2 HL102925 (BroadGO) and RC2 HL102926 (SeattleGO).
The datasets used in this manuscript were obtained from dbGaP at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/gap through dbGaP accession number phs000936”.
Policy.ic_specific_access_term: There are three consent groups for the NHLBI GO-ESP: Early-Onset Myocardial Infarction Exome Chip (Broad EOMI) study: 1) General Research Use (GRU) - Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. 2) Disease-Specific (Cardiovascular Disease) - Use of the data must be related to Cardiovascular Disease. 3) Disease-Specific (Myocardial Infarction) - Use of the data must be related to Myocardial Infarction.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cardiovascular Disease)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CVD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Cardiovascular Disease.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Myocardial Infarction)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-MI
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Myocardial Infarction.
